Text.Value: Reach forward to shake his shoulder and wake him.
Reach forward to shake her shoulder and wake her.
Have you been watching us while we are together?
You will do something divinely unspeakable on this eve.
And kill you will. Tonight, the moment you close your eyes, your favourite person will be brutalised.
You could kill this one deliberately. I'm sure it will be considered a great show of good will. The tithe could still be yours.
You can try to deceive me all you wish - you cannot deceive your own heart.
Had you excelled instead of resisted, you would have received a disgusting Prize already. But it's not too late yet.
You are wrong to consider another your equal.
An example must be set.
Leave and go back to sleep.
*The corpse feels carefree, peaceful, and loving to linger beside.*
Madness will take over my body against my will, and I will kill you.
Do you know who I am?
*As your hand approaches his body, it wavers. It longs to close around his throat.*
*As your hand approaches her body, it wavers. It longs to close around her throat.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] reaches out their hand, but hesitates. Idle. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player reaches out their hand, but hesitates.

Text.Value: Each man kills the thing he loves.
We all kill what we love most, in time.
*With almost no struggle, he has gone out like a light.*
*With almost no struggle, she has gone out like a light.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *Tav glances over the dead body of the companion.*

Text.Value: Your blood will clot for me like liquid rubies.
I'm going mad, aren't I?
Kill him.
Kill her.
Didn't you die?
What in the Hells do you want?
Should this inner fiend seek battle again, I'll give it one. Let it taste the edge of the Blade.
We'll get through this together. I'll protect us. And we'll skip through fate like two truants on the beach at midday.
This is surmountable, I'm sure. I'll protect you until you prevail.
You are not alone in this - none of us are. We can even compare notes if you like.
Whenever this Urge strikes next, we will fight it and we will win.
I'll help protect you, I promise. Seems I'll need to, just to keep myself safe.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: The beast that killed Alfira will call again - my possessed mind will kill you.
He is an insult to the name of devils, posing as a monster with that sickly good heart.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: Glad you're all right. Get some rest, and may only the sweetest spirits haunt your dreams.
Must've been a doozy. Look after yourself, all right? And wake me up again if you can't sleep.
Hmm. All right, then. Hopefully there's no more interludes before daybreak.
All right, if you're sure. We can always talk about it in the morning.
Fine. Good night, then.
All right, then... Maybe if it happens again, try pinching yourself.
How are you feeling? Talk to me.
That you in there, love?
Welcome back to the land of the lucid - where explanations are owed, if you don't mind.
Now that you're back with us, we need to have a talk.
Not to be maudlin, but I'm glad I didn't gut you. Now: answers.
I think some more explaining is in order. Exactly what just came over you?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: There's no chance in the Hells I'm going to kill my companion.
He is so afraid. So, so afraid. Of everyone, besides you, who he ought to fear most.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: No. I'll kill Isobel instead, if I need to kill someone.
No. I'll kill the cleric instead, if I need to kill someone.
Resist and try to express understanding.
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Halsin!
I am much closer to Halsin!
Cease this insubordination. You serve me.
Surrender to the Urge. Do your worst.
*As soon as you raise the dagger, all doubts disappear from your mind, replaced by pure pleasure.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] raises their dagger, almost unconsciously. The first cut is through their vocal chord, but the sputtering, choking gasps are still audible, so the PLYR stifles them with a hand over the mouth. As the Urge grows within, the PLYR really starts getting into it, stabbing over and over and over. The companion is flailing impotently until they give one final, pathetic push and fade away. Idle here.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge kills the companion in question
EditorData.SFXTags: [KD ]Foly sounds of Stabbing companion. gets more bloody and violent  as sequence goes on
EditorData.VFXTags: [KD] Blood splaters from the impacted of the stabbing

Text.Value: Resist. Wake him up.
Resist. Wake her up.
I'm going to kill the person I care most about: you. Unless you can stop me.
I didn't lay a finger on Isobel. I can control myself.
You know there is murder slumbering within you, and in controlling it, it has grown insatiable. Your Dark Urge will have death tonight, one way or another.
Maybe we still can. There's yet to be a storm we couldn't weather.
That's what we do. We help each other. Right?
What is it? A curse? Compulsion? Enthrallment? Whatever it is, we're going to free you of it.
Whatever it is that's controlling you, we can fight it. I know that better than anyone.
We have too many battles before us. I will not have you falling to bloody madness.
Seems like some sort of curse - the last bloody thing we need. But we're going to help you through this, together.
Oh, rather. Can't you tell how the Urge is thickening? You have been altogether too good to appease it.
*Your companions sleep like blissful lumps of meat.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The BUTLER appears in this shot, beside the body of the Dark Urge's favourite companion.

Text.Value: One of your station has no equal to call a friend.
So all those sweet words were said in the hope of lying with him? Hah! A fine performance, O my itching liege!
So all those sweet words were said in the hope of lying with her? Hah! A fine performance, O my itching liege!
The gods fight over her, but is she truly that special?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: *The night passes sick and sweating, but bloodlessly.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] cont'd Sitting Bound Idle., As scene fades back, imply that the Companion is untying the Player, before they both stand up into px1 staging.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The scene fades into the next morning

Text.Value: Oh, Master! Still as thirsty as ever. But tonight you should concentrate your efforts on another.
You could do so much better, Milord.
You could do so much better, Milady.
You could do so much better, Master.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: Confess everything: you have been fiercely fighting against your Dark Urge.
He must live - I haven't yet told him how I truly feel about him.
She must live - I haven't yet told her how I truly feel about her.
A wicked wretch came to me in the night, and told me something horrible.
*Your hands are raw and bloody as every inkling of your Urge yearns to tear your bindings.*
*Your stomach churns around and around. The bile within is unsettled. Each moment brings a new surge.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge is trying to sleep or rest, wakes up and starts pacing around a quiet part of the camp.

Text.Value: You've got my attention.
Tell me what to do, and it's done.
I see... fast as in right now, I assume, rather than 'first light after some sleep' fast? You'd better tell me all.
All right, talk quickly, then.
Point me the way, and I will scrape my enemy's skin from its body.
All right, I'm awake. Tell me everything.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] DU has a woozy expression.Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: Looks like you're back to your old self. Poor Alfira - if only she'd been so lucky.
Here we are, both un-Alfira'd.
I think I see the madness slipping from your eyes. Looks like I won't be joining Alfira just yet.
I felt for the bard, seeing you like that. Poor Alfira never stood a chance, did she?
Chk. Lucky for us, we're still standing. Can't say the same for Alfira.
Are you back to yourself...? Hells, Alfira didn't stand a chance...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: *Suddenly you become drowsy. Your vision blurs and floods with yellow bile, and you faint in a dizzy blur.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] Faints and collapses., [COMP] reaction to player fainting. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
DU struggling to stay awake and then faints.

Fade to black
EditorData.VFXTags: [KD] Fade to Black when player passes out

Text.Value: You should've told me sooner. We could've figured something out.
But why didn't you tell me before? I could've helped you sooner - like you've helped me.
We're in this together, theoretically. You should have confided in me sooner.
You could have talked to me before things got murderously bad, you know. We are technically in this together.
This is no new affliction, is it? To think you'd keep this from me.
I'd rather you'd trusted me sooner, given all we've been through already.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] .Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: Recount your Urges, holding your past life responsible.
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Jaheira!
You're not in your right mind. There are healers in the city, clerics who can help.
Look - we'll do whatever it takes to keep us both safe. I promise.
Dangerous secrets are best shared with those who depend on you. I should know.
You're welcome to try and kill me, of course, but I don't die easily these days.
You're suffering - I see it. Perhaps the shadow curse still lingers? No. You are more than cursed. You are taken.
How long has this been going on? Do I even want to know the answer to that...?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg]Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: You are allowed to hate me for this.
*Your jaw convulses, and you almost bite off your own tongue.*
The fiend strikes. Punish it, warrior. It's come for the slaughter!
Ah, soldier, what are you even on about?
There will be no gorging of any sort until breakfast - understood? Stay with me.
Of course they will, dear. Now just relax, dawn will be here soon.
Kainyank. You will lay no hand on me tonight.
Whatever's whispering these rabid thoughts to you - block it out. Focus on me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: Sob. Say nothing.
Try to express gratitude.
No, I'll kill anyone else instead. But not one of my companions.
Hells. What wretch? What did it say?
I'll kill the bastard. What happened?
And you're quite sure it wasn't a dream? Cheese partaken at a late hour can wreak havoc on the unconscious... Go on, tell me about it.
More horrible than our day-to-day lives? Well this I have to hear.
Tell me.
Well, could be worse... It could have done something horrible. What did it say?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] DU has a woozy expression.Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: I am but an eager messenger, from the depths of your dirty thoughts.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The Butler rises to his feet, and lightly hops over the sleeping companion and bows in a groveling nature.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KD] Foly of Butler jumping over companion to player

Text.Value: It is my duty to ensure you are making the right decisions, Master.
Gods, what's the matter? You look like you've seen a gravehound's ghost.
You look like hell. What's wrong?
Wait. I'm not sure I like that look in your eyes. What's wrong?
Although you don't look entirely... yourself. What's going on in that head of yours?
Bah - you look sick as a cadaver. What's come over you?
Hold on, you look like you've had a shock - is something the matter?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] DU has a woozy expression.Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: I won't lay so much as a talon on him. I wouldn't rob you of that delight.
I won't lay so much as a talon on her. I wouldn't rob you of that delight.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [BUTLER] rises to his feet, and lightly hops over the sleeping companion and bows in a groveling nature. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The Butler rises to his feet, and lightly hops over the sleeping companion and bows in a groveling nature.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KD] Foly of Butler jumping over companion to player

Text.Value: I love feeling you close. But are you sure -
Mm - hello, love. Did you have a bad dream?
Mmm. A pleasant dream gives way to an even more pleasant reality.
Well, hello. Looking for a cuddle?
Your breath and body - the heat of you. You know what it does to me.
Hmm...? Oh, has the mood struck you, love? I suppose we could try, if you think the others won't stir...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] The Companion awakens from their sleep.Choose an appropraite start sleeping position for character, sit up during line

Text.Value: Ah yes - the memory problem. I'm afraid I'm not allowed to interfere but know you had the thirstiest knife-arm in the Coast, before you were stolen away from my side.
I wish I'd discovered you drinking yourself to death in a tavern with some bedfellows of negotiable virtue, and not this debacle.
*Surely it is preposterous anything else would happen tonight?*
Then it should be a trifling matter to kill this one!
Tell the story, but lay heavy blame on the Butler.
*As you tell your story, fatigue fills your body. Your head swims with the worst headache you've known.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *REUSE* Tired Attitude and Emotion keys for Player. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: DU has a pained expression

Text.Value: That blasted thing better hope I don't catch it. I'll slice it in two, fancy hat and all.
I'll fuck him up. Bad. Just say the word next time he slithers into our camp, and he's gone.
A most dire night-visitor to be burdened with, sounds like. My sympathies.
The little shit. And here I hoped I was your only night-time visitor.
Damnable vermin. I will not let you be preyed upon by this - this louse.
Gruesome-sounding wretch - not something I envy of you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: You're not making any sense.
Shit. This isn't good.
Easy, now - a piece of me will burn you going in and out.
By the Weave, you're practically rabid. This is not good, if I may state the obvious.
Ah ah ah! We ask before we bite.
Tsk'va! The banished prince willing, I'll bite back.
Tsk'va! Vlaakith willing, I'll bite back.
No - keep back. No biting. This is worse than I thought...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that. companion avoid the player trying to bite them
EditorData.NodeContext: [Astarion: as if telling off a toddler]

EditorData.stateContext: Tav's hand ends up going to draw a dagger in a flash.

Text.Value: Your betters are no fans of the company you've been keeping...
He has his own devil, just as you have me. Aren't you a foul pair?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: Your perfect instincts force your knife-arm. You know that well from the bard.
Get away from him!
Get away from her!
I love him. No, it cannot be.
I love her. No, it cannot be.
The fiend's slain. As if I could ever have doubted you. Now rest - you've earned it.
Thank me when we've both survived the night.
Gratitude can wait - you're not out of the woods yet. Stay focused.
You'd do the same to me. Now just relax - dawn isn't far off.
I don't need thanks - I need answers. For now, rest. We'll speak come dawn.
You can thank me once the bloodlust subsides. Keep focused.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: *There is a beautiful blush on his cheeks that was never there while he was alive.*
*There is a beautiful blush on her cheeks that was never there while she was alive.*
Good night, sweet Lord.
Good night, sweet Lady.
Good night, sweet Master.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler disappears.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KD ] Bulter Magicly dissapears when he bows
EditorData.VFXTags: [KD] Butler Magicly disapears when he bows

Text.Value: You misunderstand - I don't care about him at all.
You misunderstand - I don't care about her at all.
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Minthara!
We are indomitable together. You underestimate us.
What in the hells do you mean you're my Butler?
Hate you? The coast would sooner be swallowed whole by the Sea of Swords.
Pfft. Hate you? I love the drama. Bring it on.
Hate's too easy for my liking. Let's take the high road on this.
I don't hate you. Because this is not you.
Hate you? Don't be ridiculous. If I hated you, you'd already be dead.
Let's save the hate for those who deserve it. This isn't your fault.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: I promise I will be the person you see in me.
I do not doubt you will act with the decorum befitting one of your rank.
You don't have to shoulder this burden alone.
We'll get through this. Like two roaches in an apocalypse, mind, but still.
Chin up. We'll best this... well, whatever it is.
But whatever this is, you will get through it. And I'll be here to make sure you do.
Now - a new dawn has come, with new victories to claim.
We'll best this - just think positively. Or at least... don't think murderously.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: *You return to your bedroll, and sleep like the dead.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Either only show player turning and walking away, or, *REUSE* back half of CINE_CampSleep_Side_toBack to show player settling into their bedroll. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black, companion will be dead the next morning.

Text.Value: Why not whisper it while you twist a knife? Or have a love confession be the final words between you?
Ready yourself to attack.
You are a champion. If this foe demands blood, then tear off its limbs and let it drink its own!
Bloodlust has made a poet of you.
No, no clotting. I like my blood flowing in my veins, thank you most kindly.
A little late, but good effort. Now just relax, dawn will be here soon.
Spill one drop of my blood, and yours will flow like a river. Now get it together!
Quite an imagination. Try applying it to some peaceful thoughts. I know you can.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: I've been cursed. When I fall asleep, I will try to murder you.
It is. You are my greatest adventure -
To be honest, the thought of holding you down while you try to rip my throat out is kind of wonderful.
Let's not throw the murderous baby out with the bathwater - it's not all right, but it's what I'm willing to do. For you.
Well no, you tried to kill me, of course it's not all right.
Certainly not. But you didn't leave any unwanted bruises last night.
I won't quite say that - far from it. But you and I have a bond. I can't let a little bloodlust ruin that.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: Your clever mind is penning tragedy as we speak. Your repressed Urge yearns to kill.
Try to bite him.
Try to bite her.
There comes a time where every precious young Master must triumph over scrutiny.
Spend a while admiring the pretty corpse of your dead darling.
You are not the before. You are the now, you are the later. If your past is so diseased, let it wither and plant something new.
It's bad. I won't say it isn't. But... I've done worse. Powers beyond our control picked us to do their dirty work - that isn't our fault.
Few have an unblemished history. You must better yourself, not condemn yourself.
If anyone understands an internal voice forcing your hand, I do. But that's not who we are now. We make our own choices, and you made the right one last night.
You craved for blood. There needn't be shame in that. You may even carry a grain of pride.
That person's a stranger to me. Don't torment yourself with the past.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: She came all the way to this world, just to die here.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: I can control myself.
Sob over the body.
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Shadowheart!
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Wyll!

EditorData.stateContext: Target character wakes up as Tav gets closer, without laying a hand on them.

Text.Value: There was much disappointment at your reluctance to kill the little Moonmaiden.
Harming me will not aid him in the slightest. Nothing will at this point.
Harming me will not aid her in the slightest. Nothing will at this point.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The Butler rises to his feet, and lightly hops over the sleeping companion and bows in a groveling nature.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KD] Foly of Butler jumping over companion to player

Text.Value: Master, I am a professional. I've seen the two of you together. Every one of your darkest desires craves him.
Master, I am a professional. I've seen the two of you together. Every one of your darkest desires craves her.
Growl.
That's it. Gather your might, slaughter the fiend that stalks you!
GRRROOOAAAARRR!
All right, let that anger out however you see fit.
Growl all you want, it won't stop the dawn. This will be over soon.
Enough. I am not your enemy!
Growling? Come on, at least use words. You're better than this - fight it.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: Perhaps I might be stronger without such sentimental attachments.
You are in a lot of danger. We need to act fast.
*Thoughts flittering, you prepare to be hated.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: *REUSE* [PLYR] begins to sob, and moves to caress their companion.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black, fade to the morning

RollAdvantageReason.Value: You're in a romance with this character.

Text.Value: You misunderstand - I don't care about him at all.
You misunderstand - I don't care about her at all.
I will scoop out those watchful eyes and toss them to the dogs.
You must be joking.
Now isn't the time. I need to protect you.
Oh... sorry. I just had a bad dream. Go back to sleep.
*Your companion rests blissfully, without a fear in the world.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Refocus on target character

Text.Value: I think I'll slit your throat.
You convinced me to spare Nightsong. You and I are both capable of resisting the darkness that compels us.
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Gale!
You must have killed me hundreds of times since you were a youngling. I hope there will be hundreds more...
Madness - or a curse, perhaps? There must be some cure, some potion for you to take.
That's so sweet. And fucked up. As for whether I can stop you, I wouldn't worry about that.
I... see? Sweet that you care enough to murder me. Mind if you don't?
How flattering. And disturbing.
Nonsense. Bloodshed is for battle, and flattery for the triumph after.
I suppose I'm flattered - and alarmed.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] .Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: *You drink in the sight until the dawn.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black, fade to the morning

Text.Value: At last! I've found the prodigal! And in what a sorry state, without your Butler to guide you.
*In the heat of the night, these last gasps are those of disappointment.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
TAV kills the companion

Screen goes RED - Dark Urge
EditorData.VFXTags: [KD] Blood splaters from the impacted of the stabbing

Text.Value: I tried time again to find you, after you became indisposed. Your inheritance is waiting, and I am waiting to grant it to you, if you do one little thing.
I wish nothing more than to cut you up and eat you raw!
Hey. Hey! Stay with me!
Attention, soldier! You do not have permission to freak the fuck out right now.
Easy there... Your mind is your own, as are your limbs. Don't do anything rash.
Keep it together, or so help me...
Keep calm. Breathe. Come back to me.
This thing won't have you. It won't win.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: He thinks he might end the world. But you and I could do far worse.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: He is my closest friend. It could never happen.
She is my closest friend. It could never happen.
And what is an adventure without monsters to slay, and toasts to be made after?
I can take you at your worst. With pleasure.
This is a rather high-risk romance we've embarked upon, isn't it? Brings new meaning to the term 'strange bedfellows'.
But nothing is ruined either. After all, what's a little attempted murder between friends?
Consensual bruises? Those can be negotiated.
I'm sure someone will write a romantic ballad about this one day - hopefully not a tragic one.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: It will be the most perfect, most brutal death in your long career. Even from before your little indisposition.
I also tend to your grounds, manage your estate, arrange murder victims for you to systematically brutalise, and serve dinner.
I think I will...
*You are not yourself. All control is gone.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] wakes to find they are bound on the ground. Idle., [COMP] Kneeling beside them. Use one of the kneeling Attitudes. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The DU has fainted, and we now see them with their hands tied behind their back. The companion sits nearby watching them. The Dark Urge is thrashing about.
EditorData.VFXTags: [KD] Eyes opening/blinking vinette on camera looking like the player is waking up

Text.Value: I am here to watch your moment of triumph, my loathly Master.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The Butler rises to his feet, and lightly hops over the sleeping companion and bows in a groveling nature.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KD] Foly of Butler jumping over companion to player

Text.Value: You wouldn't - you couldn't. Could you?
Driving you that mad, am I?
Why, I've shared my heart with you. And I'd truly rather you didn't skewer it.
I'd rather be the only dark power inside your body, if it's all the same to you.
Raise a hand against me, and even a lover would not live to speak the tale.
Hells, what I wouldn't give for a boring lover sometimes.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] .Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: And next time you're in a killing mood, let me know. I'll point you in the right direction.
You sure keep me on my toes, don't you? S'why I keep you around.
At least there's no shortage of enemies out there for you to kill. A veritable feast for the violent-at-heart.
Anyway, it's a brand-new day. I'm sure we'll find lots of people for you to kill.
So let's get to claiming them, before someone else beats us to it.
Besides, there's plenty of foes out there for you to vent your impulses on.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: *This is far more thrilling than your nights together ever could be.*
The bruises I will give you shall gorge themselves on your blood.
I will save him, whatever it takes.
I will save her, whatever it takes.
You've judged my affections wrongly - I am much closer to Astarion!
I am planning to kidnap Isobel. Alive.

EditorData.stateContext: The DU lying down with their hands tied behind their back. The companion sits nearby watching them. The Dark Urge is thrashing about.

Text.Value: *You once again inhabit your own mind.*

EditorData.SFXTags: [KD] Foly of rope being cut with knife to free the player

Text.Value: I trust you. Gods only know if I should - but I do.
I've killed people too. Innocence is for the lucky. Life is dirty, and we've got the stain of it.
That's capitulation, not a solution. Let's search for less drastic means.
Oh please, how many lives have you taken? Dozens? I must have brought Cazador a thousand souls.
That's one solution. Someone else, I'd consider it. But you're not someone else, so we'll have to find another.
Well, it's always an option if we're out of ideas... but let's at least try to save you before it comes to that, hmm?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: Your inheritance of your estate depends on you maintaining a healthy stream of kills.
Have you forgotten? Whenever this frail carcass perishes, you shall always be sent a fresh Sceleritas.
Remain for a while in the company of the corpse.
What in the - oh!
Whoa - everything all right, soldier?
Mmm... mmmph? Ah! What're you...? This is a truly disgusting hour to seek a chin-wag, you know.
Please tell me this is important. You need my beauty sleep.
Tsk'va. Don't wake a sleeping warrior without expecting a blade through your belly.
What the...? Hells, don't wake me like that. I was almost reaching for a weapon.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] The Companion awakens from their sleep.Choose an appropraite start sleeping position for character, sit up during line

Text.Value: Whatever fiend's got hold of you, it's made a battlefield of your mind.
Whatever's happening to you will pass. It doesn't scare me. Stay with me.
Spare me the gory details - I know you're still in there. Hold fast.
You're cute, you know. In another life we might have been friends.
Deliciously feral. Now hold that Urge and save it for the battlefield.
If you've energy to flirt, you've energy to fight this thing. Stay with me, I know you can.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: Now, on to the matter at hand.
It is precisely because you didn't touch her, that you are insatiable. Your Dark Urge will have death, one way or another. Tonight.
Consider it done.
She thinks she is finally away from the monsters. Poor fool.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Butler is crouched low beside the sleeping companion.

Text.Value: *The maiming twitches consume you. You cannot talk.*
Rise up, meet its gaze. Show it no fear, and grant it no mercy.
You can do this. I've got you, and I'm not letting you go.
Steady. You can rein this in - nobody's getting hurt.
Easy now, darling. You've got this. And I've got you.
Listen to me. Whatever this lunacy, defy it - or you will answer to my blade.
Easy. You're in control. Bloodlust won't win tonight.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [greg] companion is sitting near the player as they are going through withdrawl, sitting position is differerent than when they just had woke. Its not a relaxed moment, establish a pose that refects that.

Text.Value: It's really all right?
Wake up the others - you may be a danger to all of them.
I've killed so many people. You should end me here and now.
*You grant one last caress to your dead companion.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLYR] begins to sob, and moves to caress their companion.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black, fade to the morning

Text.Value: This is what happened with Alfira, isn't it? By Balduran's helm, if only I'd known.
Maybe then... Alfira would still be here? But - we're here now. And we're going to fix this.
This certainly casts the butchery of Alfira in a new light... but we'll find a solution for this, you and I.
It certainly puts the death of dear, sweet Alfira into some perspective.
Chk - it might have been your hand that struck Alfira. But it was this madness that guided it.
Suddenly Alfira's death makes a lot more sense... We're going to figure this out, understand? We have to.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [Greg] .Companion should be in the sitting up pose after waking

Text.Value: Resist and try to express understanding.
He adores you so blindly. Like a pup. Don't you find it sickening?
She's as good as dead anyway. She won't be saved by the power of love. Not yours.
You like him for more than his looks, but he will never believe that. Why not make him a pretty corpse?
She is only using you. Don't you know that?
He would forget his god for you. But you won't for him, of that I know.
She was starting to trust you. The only one she ever has. Pity it's coming to an end.
It is too late. You ignored your Urge, and now it is insatiable.
I did! It felt wonderful.
But worry not, your loyal Butler Sceleritas Fel is here, ready to get you back to behaving like a fellow of your fine breeding ought.

Synopsis:
The Dark Urge finds the Butler at their bedside after failing to kill Isobel. They are faced with the urge to kill, instead, whatever character has the highest approval to them (or their romantic partner, if they have one).
Some characters are excluded from this murder.
